page.title: 17SOUTH BANK MARKET
page.content: The outdoor market at{South Bank}has existed for many years.It was originally held along the sides of {Lorne Terrace}but during the redevelopment of South Bank a place was made for it behind{Middlesbrough {Road}near the 'Old Mans Park'.Even with the introduction of large Supermarkets like{Asda}the market has continued to prosper.The market is of the traditional type which moves to a different town each day.Residents complain that the market causes a lot of litter,but at the end of each day the council clear the site.When the new road goes through South Bank the market may move its site again.
